summary: Just a simple re-color for aspen branches texture.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Description[/size][/font]

Recolored the branch textures of the aspen trees to achieve a more natural look. Might work well with some ENBs while look bad with the others.
Updated: Matching tree LODs.

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]Installation[/size]

Extract the zip file to Skyrim Data folders or use Nexus Mod Manager to install.

[size=4]Mod used in screenshots
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17168/?]Skyrim Bigger Tree[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32246/?]Ultimate Lush Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73537/?]Aspen bark texture[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220/?]Verdant[/url]
